subject: Steroids
Baseball
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Prominent New York attorney Richard D. Emery will assist in defending Brian McNamee against allegations that he lied in the Mitchell Report about Roger Clemens’s use of steroids and human growth hormone.
snippet: Prominent New York attorney Richard D. Emery will assist in defending Brian McNamee against allegations that he lied in the Mitchell Report about Roger Clemens’s use of steroids and human growth hormone.
